these are all negative statements that don't help your team, and therefore are against the rules.

this is one of the mildest chat logs I've ever seen, by the way. if this is the only chat log you received, I would submit a ticket to support and ask for more chat logs.

support.riotgames.com

Not everything one says is going to be sunshine and rainbows "come on guys, we can do it!" thats just an asinine standard and should not be bannable. Stating the obvious, such as the fact that someone is being "toxic" or should be reported, should never be a reportable offense. This is why noone respects the justice system.

well it is.

there's no reason to say it, and it makes a teammate feel bad, so it's against the rules.

> Stating the obvious, such as the fact that someone is being "toxic" or should be reported, should never be a reportable offense.

If it's obvious what's the point of stating it? Do you walk up to fat people in the street and tell them they're fat?

That was a really stupid comparison like comparing apples to oranges. People to not ACT FAT. But people DO act like cocks. If someone is ACTING like a douchebag on purpose, yeah im going to fucking tell them.

Ok thank you. I take responsibility for my actions and accept the outcome. Just a shame what goes on on a day to day basis thru comms and nothing ever happens to people who ACTUALLY deserve to be punished. Every single game there's someone bashing another player, with the most obscene vulgarities and they go unpunished despite being reported. Seems kinda backwards to me. Thanks guys.

> [{quoted}](name=talon mid only,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AYdEm283,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-15T10:59:23.737+0000)Every single game there's someone bashing another player, with the most obscene vulgarities and they go unpunished despite being reported. Seems kinda backwards to me. Thanks guys.

I think it's important to remember that you don't always get an alert when someone is punished. Your reports are definitely doing more than you think.
I was not aware of that. Thank you for enlightening me :)

It's probably one of the most frustrating issues IMO - because people don't get feedback they have no confidence that the system is doing anything. Riot need to either increase the amount of feedback or make it more known how the feedback works so people don't think all these toxic players are going unpunished.
Saying that you are going to report someone can be punished for.

Something like so should only be a chat restriction, but then again if you've been reported enough times they probably just jumped you to a full ban. Also threatening to report someone is something you shouldn't do because it can be seen as harassment.
